item.description:
Ristorante Fiore (http://ristorantefior...) is a classy restaurant run by chef/owner Fiore Collela. NEEM had lunch there on the roofdeck last summer. This time we'll meet in the rear of the lounge from 6:00-7:00 for meeting-up and mingling. There will be a pianist playing nearby. At about 7:00, we'll go up to the 2nd floor for dinner. Price ranges are: Salads $9-11, Antipasti $12-16, Pizzas $13-16, Pasta $17-28, Meat/Chicken/Fish $20-36. All portions are large. After dinner, for those with more time, we'll head back to the lounge for an after dinner drink and to enjoy the only live piano music in the North End. The restaurant is located on the left side of Hanover St. as you come from the Greenway, about 2 blocks down.

IMPORTANT: Please access our 'About' tab for further event guidelines.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the rear of the lounge.
item.name: Ristorante Fiore-Dinner
